AUN210.name: AUN210 Standard Ramp
AUN210.description: The AUN210 does not fold. Tailgate can close with motorcycle loaded if motorcycle fits within usable bed length with 3" buffer. Requires AC004 for loading/unloading in tailgate-close scenarios.
features: Supports tailgate closure with motorcycle loaded

AUN250.name: AUN250 Folding Ramp (Premium)
AUN250.description: The AUN250 folds only when motorcycle is NOT loaded. Tailgate cannot close while motorcycle is loaded. Tailgate can close when motorcycle is removed and ramp is folded.
features: Compatible with 4-Beam extension for long beds
Ideal for short and standard bed trucks

futureModels._comment: Placeholder for upcoming ramp models - add new models here following the same structure

tailgateMustCloseUnloaded.reason: AUN250 allows tailgate closure when folded (motorcycle not loaded)

tailgateMustCloseLoaded.reason: AUN210 allows tailgate closure with motorcycle loaded if it fits

longBed.reason: AUN210 recommended for long beds; AUN250 requires 4-Beam extension
